Description: Commercial Manager in construction refers to the application of skills to maximize business potential by ensuring the successful management of the project’s finances, procurement and the processes that can impact a project’s profits, timescales, and quality.Commercial manager is responsible for the budget and keeps on top of all the costs involved in large-scale construction projects. They source the services and resources needed, negotiating costs with other suppliers. They oversee projects and monitor plans to ensure deadlines are met, projects stay within budget and work is up to standard.The Commercial Manager is required to ensure that all commercial aspects of the projects under their remit are properly managed and controlled and that the commercial plan is developed and delivered in accordance with the requirements of the business.Skills
Skills: 7 years experience in commercial, tendering, or contract & KSA experience in the construction sector is preferable.
